Message.Title: Are the Clintons sabotaging Obama?
Message.Msg: Yahoo news had their own article about this same subject. Let me explain further... We heard about the racial slurs that were directed at Obama within the Clinton camp during the 2008 primary presidential election campaign. The Clintons have long despised Obama. Democrats actually have two competing main support groups within the Democratic Party not counting the black caucus. for example candidates such as Kerry and Obama were with Ted Kennedy; and on the other side candidates such as Al Gore and Howard Dean were with Bill Cliinton. Both sides are socialist but both are both power hungry and jealous of each other, which is very typical of Democrats. Further reading, look up at glennbeck website dated 2012/06/06/

Message.Title: Get your own private email
Message.Msg: What are you going to do if or when Yahoo says okay that's it, we are no longer providing email? My advice is avoid webmail like yahoo, google, hotmail, aol, and juno. many scan your email and sell your personal information. If your internet provider may provide you with your own email address, us eit instead. Or register your own domain through like godaddy and get a subscription for service and use MS Outlook. It doesn't cost much and it's yours. Have a good day yahoo'ers.
I responded to a post about yahoo's awful email but yahoo shows my post as a separate message. What the......

Message.Title: Alibaba
Message.Msg: Excuse my not looking it up but did Yahoo close on the Alibaba transaction? Can YHOO still back out if they like? I've always thought they should hold on to that investment and forget the cash.

Topic.Title: Alibaba reportedly close to raising $8B, NY Times reports

Message.Msg: Can they back out? Why would they sell Alibaba? I know the shareholders want cash now but buying YHOO and Softbank are the only ways you can own Alibaba shares so I just don't see why they would sell unless one thinks Alibaba's prospects are bad.

Message.Title: What was Yang thinking in turning down MSFT and why won't MSFT come back??
Message.Msg: Just combining YHOO mail w/ hotmail (or the new service they are switching to) and combining YHOO content with MSFT network (and Bing search and many other synergies with YHOO) and getting YHOO exposure to Asia would be very accretive to MSFT.

So does that increase the YHOO 20% of that deal by $600 mil.??? Also when does YHOO get the $550 mil for YHOO China royalties??

Topic.Title: Article on Scottrade by Sinocast news (always dubious and poorly written) says AG deal to....

Message.Msg: Alibaba Group valued at $45B will give Yahoo $7.6B instead of $7.1B. Yahoo will get their $550M when they get the rest of the money from Alibaba Group. For as much time as you spend here you should know this.

Message.Title: premier serice blues
Message.Msg: has anyone else here subscribed to Yahoo's MarketTracker and have problems getting real-time quotes for stocks? Message.Title: Any FB investors since IPO have to be pretty bummed!
Message.Msg: How about a YHOO/ FB merger? One share FB for one YHOO. FB increases their float by less than 50% but increases revenues and profits by over 100%. FB growth is going to slow any how and with that you get a real internet powerhouse with lots of cash, eyes and content (and Asia exposure) that could challenge GOOG, etc.
